com.turkcell.curio
Class CurioClient

java.lang.Object
  com.turkcell.curio.CurioClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
INetworkConnectivityChangeListener
public class CurioClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements INetworkConnectivityChangeListener

Main entrance class for the curio client SDK. SDK can be used first by calling createInstance, and then can be called by calling getInstance method.

Author:
Can Ciloglu

Nested Class Summary
 class CurioClient.StaticFeatureSet
          Holder class for features that is not changing, mostly device specific features.

public static CurioClient createInstance(Context context)
Creates an client instance. Should be called first.

Parameters:

startSession

public void startSession()
Starts a session at server and generates a new session code. Should be called at onCreate of application's main activity. Should always be called before any other analytic methods. Should be called once per application session.

startSession

public void startSession(boolean generate)
Starts a session at server. Should be called at onCreate of application's main activity. Should always be called before any other analytic methods. Should be called once per application session.

Parameters:
generate - - Generates a new session code if true.

startScreen

public void startScreen(Context context,
                        java.lang.String title,
                        java.lang.String path)
Starts a screen at server. Should be called at "onStart" of an activity or fragment. Should be called once per activity or fragment.

Parameters:
context - Activity which this method be called at.
title - String that will be defined as title of this activity at server.
path - String that will be defined as path of this activity at server.

endScreen

public void endScreen(Context context)
Ends the screen at server. Should be called at "onStop" of an activity or fragment. Should be called once per activity or fragment.

Parameters:
context - Activity which this method be called at.

endSession

public void endSession()
Ends the session at server. Should be called at onStop of application's main activity. Should be called when user is really exiting from the application. Usage is:

if(isFinishing()){
CurioClient.getInstance().endSession();
}

Should be called once per application session.

sendEvent

public void sendEvent(Context context,
                      java.lang.String key,
                      java.lang.String value)
Sends an event to server.

Parameters:
context - Activity which this method be called at.
key - Key for the event
value - Value for the event
